text: 🚨 new report reveals the harsh reality of healthcare affordability in the US 💸🏥 did you know that 36% of people have skipped or postponed medical care due to cost? 🤯 the uninsured are even more likely to delay care for over a year 😱 check out PayZen's report for more eye-opening stats and let's work together towards affordable healthcare for all! 💪
